summary: This document details an investigation into a voyeurism incident involving John 'Chris' Ryan and Ethel 'Lisa' Velasquez at Florida State University. The victim reported being secretly videotaped while sleeping in Ryan's room, and Velasquez allegedly showed the video to the victim. The investigation led to charges of perjury against Velasquez for providing false testimony regarding the incident.

persons.name: John 'Chris' Ryan
persons.context: Ryan is accused of voyeurism for allegedly videotaping a female friend while she slept in his room.

persons.name: Ethel 'Lisa' Velasquez
persons.context: Velasquez is involved in the case as she allegedly showed the victim the video and is charged with perjury for her testimony.

persons.name: Unnamed Victim
persons.context: The victim reported being videotaped without her consent while sleeping in Ryan's room.

persons.name: Rod Colas
persons.context: Colas was informed about the incident by the victim and is involved in the administrative response.

persons.name: Jacqui Pequignot
persons.context: Pequignot made contact with the victim regarding the incident and facilitated the reporting process.

persons.name: John Ryan
persons.context: John Ryan contacted the investigator to discuss the case and defend his son against the allegations.

connections.description: Ryan and Velasquez are in a romantic relationship, which complicates the investigation.
Velasquez and the victim are friends, but their relationship becomes strained due to the incident.
Ryan and the victim have a platonic friendship that is affected by the voyeurism allegations.
John Ryan is the father of John 'Chris' Ryan and is involved in defending his son against the allegations.

events.title: Incident Reported
events.description: The victim reported being shown a video of herself sleeping in Ryan's room, where he was allegedly masturbating over her.

events.title: Victim Files Report
events.description: The victim met with investigators to file a formal report regarding the voyeurism incident.

events.title: Trespass Warning Issued
events.description: Ryan was issued a trespass warning for Jennie Murphree Hall as part of the investigation.

events.title: Arrest of Velasquez
events.description: Ethel 'Lisa' Velasquez was arrested on a warrant for perjury related to her testimony in the case.

locations: Jennie Murphree Hall, Florida State University
keyFacts: The victim reported being videotaped without her consent while sleeping in Ryan's room.
Ethel 'Lisa' Velasquez allegedly showed the victim the video and is charged with perjury for her testimony.
John 'Chris' Ryan denied any wrongdoing and refused to provide a statement to investigators.
The investigation revealed inconsistencies in Velasquez's statements, leading to her arrest for perjury.
The victim decided to pursue administrative action rather than criminal charges against Ryan.
